com.linecorp.armeria.client.routing

Class EndpointGroupInvoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.DecoratingRemoteInvoker
      • com.linecorp.armeria.client.routing.EndpointGroupInvoker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteInvoker, AutoCloseable

    public final class EndpointGroupInvoker
extends DecoratingRemoteInvoker

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EndpointGroupInvoker(RemoteInvoker delegate, String groupName)
      Creates a new instance that decorates the specified RemoteInvoker, such that invocations are made against one of the endpoints in end EndpointGroup named groupName.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      <T> Future<T> invoke(EventLoop eventLoop, URI uri, ClientOptions options, ClientCodec codec, Method method, Object[] args)
      Performs a remote invocation to the specified URI.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public <T> Future<T> invoke(EventLoop eventLoop,
                            URI uri,
                            ClientOptions options,
                            ClientCodec codec,
                            Method method,
                            Object[] args)
                     throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: RemoteInvoker
        Performs a remote invocation to the specified URI.
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface RemoteInvoker
        Overrides:
        invoke in class DecoratingRemoteInvoker
        Parameters:
        eventLoop - the EventLoop to perform the invocation
        uri - the URI of the server endpoint
        options - the ClientOptions
        codec - the ClientCodec
        method - the original Method that triggered the remote invocation
        args - the arguments of the remote invocation
        Returns:
        the Future that notifies the result of the remote invocation.
        Throws:
        Exception
